entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
